posts1.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
posts1.body: Closures allow functions to access variables from an enclosing scope even after that scope has closed.

posts1.title: A Guide to CSS Flexbox
posts1.body: Flexbox makes it easier to design a flexible and responsive layout structure.

posts1.title: What is REST API?
posts1.body: REST is an architectural style for designing networked applications.

posts1.title: Top 10 VSCode Extensions
posts1.body: Explore useful extensions like Prettier, ESLint, Live Server, and more.

posts1.title: Responsive Web Design Principles
posts1.body: Build sites that work well on all screen sizes using media queries and flexible layouts.

posts1.title: Getting Started with React
posts1.body: React is a library for building interactive user interfaces using components.

posts1.title: Java vs JavaScript
posts1.body: Despite the similar names, Java and JavaScript are very different in use and purpose.

posts1.title: Node.js Crash Course
posts1.body: Learn how to build server-side applications using JavaScript with Node.js.

posts1.title: Creating REST APIs with Spring Boot
posts1.body: Spring Boot makes it easy to build stand-alone, production-grade Spring applications.

posts1.title: Async/Await in JavaScript
posts1.body: Async/await simplifies asynchronous programming by making code easier to read and write.

posts2.title: Introduction to TypeScript
posts2.body: TypeScript is a strongly typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.

posts2.title: MongoDB Basics
posts2.body: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents.

posts2.title: Debugging in Chrome DevTools
posts2.body: Chrome DevTools provides powerful tools for debugging and optimizing websites.

posts2.title: Using Git and GitHub
posts2.body: Learn how to manage your code with version control using Git and GitHub.

posts2.title: Angular vs React
posts2.body: Both are powerful front-end frameworks with their own strengths and weaknesses.

posts2.title: Building a Portfolio Website
posts2.body: Showcase your skills and projects with a professional-looking portfolio site.

posts2.title: Introduction to Web Accessibility
posts2.body: Make your websites usable by everyone, including people with disabilities.

posts2.title: Deploying Apps with Vercel
posts2.body: Vercel offers an easy way to deploy front-end apps with CI/CD out of the box.

posts2.title: Understanding HTTP Methods
posts2.body: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE are core to building RESTful APIs.

posts2.title: Handling Forms in Angular
posts2.body: Angular provides reactive and template-driven approaches to handling form inputs.

fruits.title: Apple
fruits.body: Apple is a delicious and nutritious fruit enjoyed around the world.

fruits.title: Apricot
fruits.body: Apricot is a small orange fruit with velvety skin and a sweet taste.

fruits.title: Avocado
fruits.body: Avocado is a creamy fruit rich in healthy fats and nutrients.

fruits.title: Banana
fruits.body: Banana is a convenient snack and a great source of potassium.

fruits.title: Blackberry
fruits.body: Blackberry is a juicy dark berry often used in desserts.

fruits.title: Blueberry
fruits.body: Blueberry is a tiny superfood packed with antioxidants.

fruits.title: Cantaloupe
fruits.body: Cantaloupe is a sweet melon with orange flesh and netted skin.

fruits.title: Cherry
fruits.body: Cherry is a small red fruit with a tart or sweet taste.

fruits.title: Coconut
fruits.body: Coconut is used for its water, milk, and flavorful white flesh.

fruits.title: Cranberry
fruits.body: Cranberry is a tart berry used in juices and sauces.

fruits.title: Currant
fruits.body: Currant is a small berry that grows in bunches, often red or black.

fruits.title: Date
fruits.body: Date is a sweet chewy fruit commonly found in Middle Eastern dishes.

fruits.title: Dragonfruit
fruits.body: Dragonfruit has a striking pink exterior and speckled white interior.

fruits.title: Durian
fruits.body: Durian is known as the king of fruits with a strong odor.

fruits.title: Elderberry
fruits.body: Elderberry is used in syrups and is believed to support immunity.

fruits.title: Fig
fruits.body: Fig is a soft, sweet fruit full of tiny seeds.

fruits.title: Grape
fruits.body: Grape is a juicy fruit used in wine, juice, and snacks.

fruits.title: Grapefruit
fruits.body: Grapefruit is a citrus fruit with a slightly bitter, tangy taste.

fruits.title: Guava
fruits.body: Guava is rich in Vitamin C and has a floral aroma.

fruits.title: Honeydew
fruits.body: Honeydew is a sweet and light green melon.

fruits.title: Indian Fig
fruits.body: Indian Fig, or prickly pear, is a cactus fruit with vibrant colors.

fruits.title: Jackfruit
fruits.body: Jackfruit is the largest tree-borne fruit with a sweet flavor.

fruits.title: Jambul
fruits.body: Jambul is a dark purple fruit native to the Indian subcontinent.

fruits.title: Jujube
fruits.body: Jujube, or red date, is chewy and sweet when dried.

fruits.title: Kiwi
fruits.body: Kiwi is a fuzzy fruit with green flesh and black seeds.

fruits.title: Kumquat
fruits.body: Kumquat is a tiny citrus fruit eaten with its skin.

fruits.title: Lemon
fruits.body: Lemon is known for its sour taste and is used in drinks and dishes.

fruits.title: Lime
fruits.body: Lime is a green citrus fruit used to add zest and flavor.

fruits.title: Longan
fruits.body: Longan is a tropical fruit similar to lychee.

fruits.title: Loquat
fruits.body: Loquat is an orange-fleshed fruit that is juicy and tangy.

fruits.title: Lychee
fruits.body: Lychee is a juicy tropical fruit with a floral taste.

fruits.title: Mango
fruits.body: Mango is a tropical favorite known for its sweetness.

fruits.title: Mangosteen
fruits.body: Mangosteen is called the queen of fruits and has a tangy flavor.

fruits.title: Melon
fruits.body: Melon includes several varieties like cantaloupe and honeydew.

fruits.title: Mulberry
fruits.body: Mulberry looks like a blackberry and is sweet when ripe.

fruits.title: Nance
fruits.body: Nance is a yellow tropical fruit used in jams and drinks.

fruits.title: Nectarine
fruits.body: Nectarine is a smooth-skinned peach variant.

fruits.title: Olive
fruits.body: Olive is technically a fruit, often used in oil and pickles.

fruits.title: Orange
fruits.body: Orange is a popular citrus fruit rich in Vitamin C.

fruits.title: Papaya
fruits.body: Papaya is a tropical fruit with orange flesh and black seeds.

fruits.title: Passionfruit
fruits.body: Passionfruit has a jelly-like pulp and a tangy taste.

fruits.title: Peach
fruits.body: Peach is a juicy fruit with fuzzy skin and sweet flesh.

fruits.title: Pear
fruits.body: Pear is a sweet and grainy fruit enjoyed fresh or canned.

fruits.title: Persimmon
fruits.body: Persimmon is an orange fruit that tastes like honey when ripe.

fruits.title: Pineapple
fruits.body: Pineapple is a tropical fruit known for its tangy sweetness.

fruits.title: Plantain
fruits.body: Plantain is a starchy fruit used mostly in cooking.

fruits.title: Plum
fruits.body: Plum is a juicy fruit that comes in many colors and flavors.

fruits.title: Pomegranate
fruits.body: Pomegranate is full of ruby-red seeds and antioxidants.

fruits.title: Pomelo
fruits.body: Pomelo is the largest citrus fruit with a mild flavor.

fruits.title: Prickly Pear
fruits.body: Prickly Pear is a cactus fruit with bright colors.

fruits.title: Quince
fruits.body: Quince is a hard fruit often cooked into jelly or jam.

fruits.title: Raisin
fruits.body: Raisin is a dried grape used in baking and snacks.

fruits.title: Rambutan
fruits.body: Rambutan is hairy on the outside and juicy inside like lychee.

fruits.title: Raspberry
fruits.body: Raspberry is a soft red fruit with a sweet-tart taste.

fruits.title: Redcurrant
fruits.body: Redcurrant is a sour berry often used in jams and jellies.

fruits.title: Salak
fruits.body: Salak, or snake fruit, has reddish-brown scaly skin.

fruits.title: Sapodilla
fruits.body: Sapodilla is sweet and malty, with a brown rough skin.

fruits.title: Sapote
fruits.body: Sapote comes in different varieties and has a custard-like flesh.

fruits.title: Satsuma
fruits.body: Satsuma is a seedless citrus fruit that peels easily.

fruits.title: Star Apple
fruits.body: Star Apple has a purple skin and white milky pulp.

fruits.title: Starfruit
fruits.body: Starfruit has a waxy yellow skin and is shaped like a star.

fruits.title: Strawberry
fruits.body: Strawberry is a popular red fruit with seeds on the outside.

fruits.title: Surinam Cherry
fruits.body: Surinam Cherry is a ribbed, red fruit with a tart flavor.

fruits.title: Tamarillo
fruits.body: Tamarillo is also called tree tomato and is tangy-sweet.

fruits.title: Tamarind
fruits.body: Tamarind is a sour fruit often used in chutneys and sauces.

fruits.title: Tangerine
fruits.body: Tangerine is a small, easy-to-peel citrus fruit.

fruits.title: Tomato
fruits.body: Tomato is a fruit used like a vegetable in savory dishes.

fruits.title: Ugli Fruit
fruits.body: Ugli Fruit is a Jamaican citrus with wrinkled skin.

fruits.title: Watermelon
fruits.body: Watermelon is a refreshing fruit with red juicy flesh.

fruits.title: White Currant
fruits.body: White Currant is a pale berry with a delicate flavor.

fruits.title: Yuzu
fruits.body: Yuzu is a Japanese citrus fruit with a strong aroma.

fruits.title: Zucchini
fruits.body: Zucchini is technically a fruit, used in savory dishes.
